reviewText: This dvd is very enjoyable and and very educational for young minds to grow! Martin Short's voice over is the best and fun to listen and watch these animated productions. Even any  parent or grandparent will also enjoy these untiringly!
One of many that we own and love.  If you are looking for educational and entertaining DVDs then this series is for you.
The children I gave the book to it continue to thnk me,  They love the story and play the DVD over and over again

My son is four and has sadly outgrown Wordworld WordWorld: Lots of Letters Box Set, and we've run Super Why into the ground. I am very picky about what my children watch- it has to be educational. When I accidentally DVR'd an episode of The Cat in the Hat and my reading four year old spied it before I did, we checked it out. I was happily surprised. My son loves the Cat in the Hat Learning Library books, and I love them as well, we learn so much! This DVD stays true and taught us a lot. My son and daughter always pile the blankets and pillows to be their thing-a-ma-jigger and take off on adventures! I didn't know that male seahorses have a pouch for babies! Way to represent Dads, seahorses! And otters holding hands so they don't drift apart? Cute! So many of the adventures have unique songs and the Cat's silly demeanor always entertains! And appearances by Thing One and Thing Two are guaranteed to get laughs! The best part is when my son repeats to me something that he's learned from watching the show, and the show is a perfect bonus for him, especially when it ties into the Learning Library books we have.
My kids (ages 3 and 5) have loved this DVD.  The Cat in the Hat is so funny and silly and they also learn about ocean creatures while watching.  Definitely a good choice
She is a total Cat in the Hat fan. So this is definitely her "must-watch" every night before bedtime. Great buy
Not much to say, just another great set of episodes from the cat in the hat knows a lot about that. Great purchase for kids who love the show and want to watch it all the time.

Episodes included in DVD are:

Reef Magic (RE: coral reefs)
Digging the Deep (RE: the ocean floor)
King Cecil the Seahorse (RE: sea creatures)
Ice in Nice (RE: the arctic)
Help with Kelp (RE: seaweed)

Daughter absolutely loved this present.  It was encouraging to hear her laughing out loud throughout the entire DVD.  We had previously purchased "Wings and Things" DVD when the series first became available and loved all the animation and the goofiness Martin Short brings to the character.  This one was even better.  Great fun for all and educational too.  Highly recommended for anyone who has young kids.
As Expected
Went directly to granddaughter

Even tho delivery was delayed, it is a great movie for kids. Educational and has lots of songs to sing. Makes long car rides very easy!

perfect
My little boy watches this at least once a day a long with the Curious George DVDs we have orders from you.

We just discovered the Cat in the Hat videos and my 5 year old loves these movies. The commotion in the ocean teaches kids about sea horses, blow fish and so much more. I am all for educational videos, but these are fun educational videos which is a HUGE + for me!!
Thank you

Adorable show. This dvd has several episodes relating to different aspects of the ocean. It is educational and wholesome, and catches the attention of my 4 year old with its wacky Dr. Seuss twist.
